feed.title: The Miyoshi Lab
feed.subtitle: Decipher the Molecular Machanism for Mechanosensing

entry.title: 2024 ARO MidWinter Meeting
entry.content: We attended the 2024 ARO MidWinter Meeting in Anaheim, CA. Takushi and Mrudhula presented a podium and a poster, respectively. Good job, Mrudhula! Thank you for this opportunity!
entry.summary: We attended the 2024 ARO MidWinter Meeting in Anaheim, CA. Takushi and Mrudhula presented a podium and a poster, respectively. Good job, Mrudhula! Thank you for this opportunity!
